amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to prohibit the Office of Personnel Management from carrying out any furloughs or reductions in force of its employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Connolly.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
